name: Flaming Escape
description:
Submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

You play as a flame lost in an old underground, help it find it's way out. Along the way you'll encounter other lost flames,  join force with them to grow stronger and ease your way out!

Will you find the exit or extinguish your flame? 

Controls: 

  • Arrow keys or WASD to move around
  • Mouse to aim and shoot (once available)
